name: foodbracket
description: A web app for users to choose a local restaurant through an interactive, bracket-style tournament

scripts.build:frontend: cd packages/lit-frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd packages/express-backend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build: npm ci && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:backend
